name: Fletchers' Mill Provencal Salt Mill, White with Blue "Sel" - 6 inch
about_this_item: Easy-to-use and refill: the Fletchers' Mill pepper mills are for novices and experts alike-anyone who wants complete control over the seasoning of their dishes

Lock and grind system: Fletchers' Mill grinders give them precise control through a lock and grind grinding system. This unique mechanism ensures perfect consistency - whether fine grinds for fish, medium grinds for gravies or coarse grinds for meats

Adjustable fineness: grinding is performed in a two-step process: First the peppercorns are crushed to release their natural oils and flavors; next, they are ground to the chosen consistency for perfect results every time
Easy-to-clean: this mill features pop-out mechanisms for easy cleaning
Made in the U. S. A. All Fletchers mill wood products are handcrafted in in Maine from the finest new England hardwoods, and carry a limited Lifetime on the mechanism only

title: Lady of the house pays attention to elegant details
content: Beautiful as pictured, buy whole Himalayan  salt and whole peppercorns for an elegant touch to any kitchen. Mine happens French country transitional as is LR, DR.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2021

title: Verified Purchase
content: Beautiful mill, looks like the pic or better.  Works much better than the Martha Stewart mills I bought at Target years ago.  Also, not sure the picture or description conveys this, but there is a gorgeous "S" on the hardware on the very top of the mill.  It is such an adorable, thoughtful detail that I was pleasantly surprised by when opening the package.  :)
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2018

title: It's exquisite.
content: They attract a lot of attention with guests. One small caveat below.  Once in a while I find the pepper version stuffs working well and I have to flip the device over and push the mechanism back up. It’s a small issue and everyone thinks they’re just great.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2022

title: Verified Purchase
content: Beautiful, sturdy, made in USA, and perfect for my table!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2021
